channel.title: Help and Question
channel.description:
Alright first I wanna know how I can get double hits with DDS special using Palidino's 98% Special Attack Tut.
2nd, I need help with my server, I somehow messed up the dying function. When my character dies to NPCs he stays there with 0HP and loses 0 items. Also the server kinda freezes up and you can't click anywhere. I haven't yet tried this dying to another player. So yeah :S, if you can help please post so. Thanks.
Heavenly PK[br][size=1]Posted on: August 11, 2007, 05:47:51 PM[/size][hr]fixed the problem, waiting for the question to be answered

item.title: Help and Question

item.description:

Alright first I wanna know how I can get double hits with DDS special using Palidino’s 98% Special Attack Tut.
